title: Sunday shows - Second whistleblower grabs spotlight
text:
Confirmation on Sunday that a legal firm is representing another whistleblower in connection with a formal complaint about President Trump Donald John TrumpTrump criticizes supposed second whistleblower North Korea missile test raises fears of new capabilities Window narrows for Trump trade deals MORE's alleged interactions with Ukraine dominated the political talk shows.

Guests also discussed Trump's request that China investigate the Bidens and the latest developments in the House Democrats' impeachment inquiry.

Read The Hill's complete coverage below.
description: Confirmation on Sunday that a legal firm is representing another whistleblower in connection with a formal complaint about President Trump's alleged interactions with Ukraine dominated the political talk shows.
